page.title: 12INFORMATION
page.content: BARRY SCHOOL HAS 2 BBC COMPUTERS WHICH ARE USED DAILY.ONE WAS BOUGHT BY PARENTS THROUGH A SPECIAL GOVERNMENT SCHEME.THE OTHER WAS PROVIDED BY TAYSIDE REGIONAL COUNCIL THE PROGRAMS WE USE VARY FROM "TABLE" PRACTICE,LANGUAGE PROGRAMS,TO ADVENTURE GAMES WHERE PUPILS HAVE TO MAKE DECISIONS.OUR FAVOURITE THIS YEAR HAS BEEN "FLOWERS OF CRYSTAL".PUPILS FROM BARRY SCHOOL SPENT 2 DAYS AT A COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY SHOWING INTERESTED VISITORS HOW WE USE THE COMPUTERS.WE MADE LOG BOOKS OF OUR JOURNEY,POSTERS AND EVEN CRYSTALS MANY PUPILS HAVE COMPUTERS AT HOME MAINLY USED FOR PLAYING GAMES.THE POPULAR ONES ARE SINCLAIR SPECTRUM AND COMMODORE 64.BEST GAMES OF 1985 ARE ALIEN 8 AND BOOTY
